rationale: Barilius gatensis has been assessed as Least Concern, despite the threats it faces in some parts of its range. The species is stable in most of its wide distribution within the Western Ghats.
evaluator: Rema Devi, K.R., Gopalakrishnan, A., Arunachalam, M., Shrikant, J., Johnson, J.A., Rahul, K. & Molur, S.
